tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #DYK that the Foreign Service Institute Training Center located in Arlington, Virginia was named after George P. Shultz - A four-time cabinet member, WWII combat veteran, an avid supporter of foreign affairs training, and a superb diplomat! #FSI #Shultz100 twitter.com/HistoryAtState…
